verbose_text: A recent study demonstrated that gastric hepcidin expression decreased in hypergastrinemic ING-mice with chronic gastric H. pylori infection and resulted in the upregulation of the expression of various downstream iron absorption and efflux genes such as Ferroportin 1, Divalent metal transporter 1, and Transferrin receptor 1 [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: hepcidin expression decreased in hypergastrinemic ING-mice with chronic gastric H. pylori infection and resulted in the upregulation of the expression of various downstream iron absorption and efflux genes such as Ferroportin 1, Divalent metal transporter 1
